title: Exceptionally good Asian food.
text: Having tried both the restaurant for a sit down meal and the takeaway service at this lovely Indian restaurant I can say the food and service were a delight. Having travelled the Indian continent on numerous occasions I believe my wife and I are good judges of good Asian food and this restaurant is amongst the best.

title: A great local restaurant.
text: We were on a return visit to Bangkok and having been to this restaurant previously we went back. Well we were not disappointed. The food is cooked fresh, service is excellent and a true Thai atmosphere. Certainly weâ€™ll be back on our next visit.

title: A really excellent Hotel
text: We had been at this hotel for a couple of days about 16 months ago and promised we would come back one day. So we went back and spent 5 days this time. The accommodation was very good. The staff were very attentive to all our needs. The restaurant food was excellent and prepared well. The management took real interest in there guests.

title: First real Pub I visited in India
text: Our tour guide asked me did I like beer which I said I did, he then suggested we go there after our tour which we did. Well this was a delight the selection of beers were excellent and we sampled them with delight. The staff were very good and we sampled the food which was also great. Definitely worth a visit.

title: Return visit
text: Our second stay at this unique hotel. The staff were attentive and made our stay delightful. The room was comfortable, clean and made us feel at home. The restaurants were very good and the food well prepared.

title: Another visit to This Wonderful Hotel
text: Well yet another great stay at this lovely hotel. The staff and service we received was exceptional. We ate at the Massala and Chinese restaurants and had really good food. We also used the salon which offers great service without rushing and making you feel valuable.

title: A great time to see the Real Mysore
text: We were very fortunate to have use this company previously so without hesitation we booked them for 4 tours. Our guide Kainath was absolutely excellent the best so far and we have visited India on a dozen or so times. If you are looking to do something different rather than the normal sightseeing then look no further.

title: Historical Magic
text: You hear of a number of historical sites around the world and this is one of the best kept secrets, certainly worth a visit.
place: Skip the Line: Knossos Palace and Archaeological Site Entrance Ticket

title: A big bit of Venice
text: A great Palace to see great history and well presented. Certainly worth the visit. A bit expensive for food and very crowded you need to be aware of what you will face.

title: Wonders of the world
text: It is great to see this famous site and all the restoration that is going on. To walk in the steps of the apostles especially Paul is a wonder in itself

title: Our Home in Mumbai.
text: Our fifth visit to this great hotel. The overall experience is palatial. The staff are a real credit to the Taj, the food is exceptionaly good. Certainly will return when we can. A must is to try the special cocktail at the Harbour Exchange bar.

title: Really interesting
text: We took our teenage grand daughters on this very interesting tour. Angie our guide was so good and brought the tour to life with excellent information.

title: See Royal History.
text: We planned this visit for our grand daughters and it was a huge success. To see the jewellery that was made for Victoria by her husband was remarkable. The Diana drew collection evoked great memories of a great lady. Certainly worth a visit.

title: Great breakfast.
text: I have taken various members of my family including grandchildren for breakfast on Sundays. The food in the cafe was freshly cooked to order and delicious. Very clean and excellent service.

title: Thai delight
text: This has been a return visit for us it's about a 30 minute journey for us but we think it's worth it. The food is great and the service is excellent.

title: Sad place but if you are in Cambodia!
text: This place full of horrendous history must be seen so that all who visit are convinced it should never happen again! But you don't have to look far on the news to realise it is still happening. Sad thing is that those responsible are still free.

title: Sad but worth visiting.
text: Our second visit here this time to reflect on how evil men can cause such horendous murderous issues on innocent people. It is a reminder to us all that these things are still happening in the world and we should never excuse or forget.

title: A real look at Our History
text: We had never been here before and were very pleased with both the old town and the castle. To see one of only four of the original Magna Carta is excellant and how this has influenced so many countries. The prison experience is also a step back in history. Very well presented and good facilities.

title: A bit of old England
text: Really interesting with lots of interesting shops. The buildings are extremely interesting. But always remember you have to get back up the steep hill.

title: A great Hotel in a great location
text: We have had the pleasure of staying at this lovely hotel on three previous occasions. The staff are really very good and look after your needs. The location is close to the night market and trips out from here are very good. We will certainly visit again.

title: An experience
text: It's always worth a visit to see what's on offer. Plenty of bargains and haggling a must. Some excellant food at the street cafes.

title: A real Gem
text: If you want a coffee a cake or sandwhich in a small comfortable venue you cannot go wrong. The staff are really nice and accommodating.

title: A paradise in Siem Reap
text: Although we had been to Siem Reap on 4 previous occasions this was the first time at the Hyatt. As far as my wife and I are concerned this will be our first choice when we return and we will, The ambience of the hotel is excellent and the staff care for your needs well.

title: Regular visitor.
text: The Village cafe is very reliable place to grab something to eat. The quality of food and service is very good. It's basic food but tastes good. George is very consistant with what he prepares and works very hard with good staff to help him.

title: Once again a great visit.
text:
We have visited this hotel a good few times now and never have been disappointed. The staff are very attentive and the hotel is very comfortable. We are always looked after here. The restaurants are good and the food is always of a great standard. The atmosphere always is very inviting
. Our first choice every time.

title: A genuinely good day out.
text: We have visited this zoo several times over the years and have never been disappointed. We organised a day behind the scenes with a keeper and that was a great experience. The animals are really well cared for and presented well. Thee is so much to see and enjoy, try the night safari too.

title: Took all the family.
text: I retired at the end of last year and decided it would be good to take all my sons, there wives and children with my wife together on holiday. Now my eldest son had been to this hotel previously twice so it came with a good recommendation. When we arrived all 14 of us everything went to plan. The rooms were good clean and sufficient, we would have preferred a proper double bed rather than two pushed together but overall we were very satisfied. The food and restaurant were excellent for all the family, we went all inclusive and thought it was very God value. Certainly two of my sons are seriously considering going again. The staff were superb.

title: A good place to be.
text: We were only in Hong Kong for three days but found The Cafe a God place to stop whether it be for a coffee or tea through the day or a glass of wine in the evening.

title: Once again a real delight.
text: Having now spent our third visit to this great hotel we are already thinking about our next. The hotel for us ticks all the boxes, the staff are delightfully helpful, friendly and efficient. The food all through the day is excellent . The spa is very good and has a great atmosphere. I cannot praise the staff enough.

title: Took the kids and grandkids.
text: Because I retired in December last year my wife and I decided to take our three boys and their families altogether on a family holiday. There was 14 of us and on my eldest's son's advice we booked a holiday in this all inclusive hotel. Although my son had been here a couple of times previously I was still a bit apprehensive as my wife and I had not done the Costa for about 20 years. I have to say we all had a very great time. The Hotel is terrific for families the food was excellent and the service by all the staff was extremely good. My two other sons and their families are seriously thinking of booking for next year.

title: Simply the Best.
text: We recently visited Sorrento for the fourth time but what made it so special this time was that we discovered Delfino Restaurant on the Via Marina Grande. Friends who we caught up with had been recommended to go to this restaurant and we were all pleased to do so. The atmosphere was great looking over the Bay of Naples, the food was excellent and if you like fish then this is for you. The wine list is excellent and the service by all the staff is exceptionally good. over the week we were there my wife and I visited the restaurant on three occasions. The Sea Bass and Bream were excellent, the quantities were great, and if you have room after the first two courses plus appetizers then you must try the profiteroles. we will go again one day

title: Been to Sorrento Four Times and visited and used this restaurant reguarly.
text: This is in such a good location to watch life go by, a great menu, excellent service and very nice people. Altogether a must if you are in Sorrento

title: An interesting place to stay
text: Well located in Galle this boutique hotel has a great deal of interesting features, the converted rooms have character but because they are listed the air conditioning is not very effective. Probably would not stay again because we like the comfort of mod cons but tis lovely Hotel and its restaurant will appeal to those who like the old style buildings

title: Another great stay at the Taj
text: This is our fourth visit to this lovely Hotel and certainly will not be our last. The charm of the Hotel is endearing, the staff are a credit to the Taj and its owners. You must try as many of the restaurants as you can, the food is quite excellent. a must is to try the special Harbour 1933 cocktail, you will want a second that's for sure.

title: A very good Place to Stay
text: Our first visit to Krakow and this lovely hotel. the staff were exceptionally friendly and very helpful in booking trips and tours and looking after our needs. the room dÃ©cor was very attractive, the rooms were cleaned promptly. Buffet breakfast was very good(but they did not do fried eggs unfortunately). Bar staff and sitting area were great. we certainly will go again.

title: A beautiful City
text: One of the most beautiful cities in Europe, definitely would go again as there is plenty to do and see

title: Worth seeing that's for sure
text: This is such a lovely place to visit, plenty of good restaurants, street performers and life in general.

title: Make time to see
text: If you have seen the film see this, the exhibition brings to life the period of Nazi control and what this man did for his fellow human beings....a must to see
place: Muzeum Krakowa, oddziaÅ‚ Fabryka Emalia Oskara Schindlera

title: Long time since I visited this Place
text: It must have been at least 20 or so years since my last visit and perhaps it would not of normally been the place I would have chosen, however having 3 of my grandchildren stay with us it seemed a good day out. And it certainly was, it was easy to get around and very informative. the staff were very good and obliging and overall it was a very exciting and interesting day out.

title: A good day out with the Grand Kids
text: Searching for somewhere different that the grand children would like is exhausting at times, but we were recommended this place by a friend and it certainly lived up to that recommendation. The kids loved it and there were plenty things to keep them involved and occupied. A great day out.

title: A good value for money place to eat.
text: We discovered this Toby by accident one day several months ago and we have been regulars since. I have in the passed not been a lover of carvery meals but eating here has definitely changed my mind. The food is very good and it is replenished frequently, always piping hot and a good variety. It is very much good value for money. If you have kids its ideal for them when the family budget is tight but you enjoy a break and eating out. Look out for the discount vouchers too.

title: Get to Know the real London.
text: My wife and I planned a trip to London for the day and thought a walking tour would be Fun. I search Google and came across Matt's website which had a number of interesting options. The one we choose 'Old London' was excellent and Matt is such a good guide we went to various locations all of which had little gems of historical significance with a tale to tell also. We will certainly book another sometime soon.

title: Return Visit
text: We were on a cruise and came into Kusadasi so we decided to do the Ephesus tour. We have been here probably 6times now yet every visit brings something new. Just walking those streets and imaging who walked before you...............the apostle Paul and countless others. I am sure we will return again one day.

title: This is certainly something you must see
text: This is amazing, it gives you a great insight as to where the Ephesian people lived and such a high standard of accommodation.

title: First Visit to Teneriffe
text: Our Main visit to the Island was to see if it was a place to spend the winters but although we really enjoyed our week here and the Hotel was excellent not sure it's a place to stay too long for us, but we would certainly visit again for a short stay. In Santa Cruz this was an ideal place to stay. The rooms were very good, comfortable beds and kept immaculate. Good location from the bus station and easy to get every where on the island.

title: Always good food
text: It was advertised very well and convenient for the shops and cinema. Food was predictable but good. Service was excellent, the staff were very considerate and polite, good portions of food.

title: A Return to a lovely Hotel
text: Our second visit to this great Hotel, we stayed in the Club section and we got the same room as we had on our previous visit. The staff hear are excellent from the room cleaners up to the senior managers they are all very welcoming and go out of there way to please. The choice of food is superb and is very well prepared. the Hotel is comfortable and easy to find your way around...............I am sure we will visit again one day soon.

title: Our Home in India
text: We have been very fortunate to have stayed at this grand Hotel four times now and on each occasion we find more reasons to visit again. This is such a lovely friendly place to stay. The rooms are excellent the staff are the best and they attend to your needs exceptionally well. The choice of restaurants are the best and should be savoured on any visit. A must is to do the heritage tour of the Hotel it does not take long but it is certainly worthwhile and entertaining. Another must is to sample the special cocktail they do in the Harbour Bar, get the barman to tell you the story and have your camera ready.

title: Second visit
text: On this return visit we only spent the one night at this lovely Hotel before moving on..........but it was very good, the restaurant was excellent, limited choice but we found something we liked. the staff were very good and took care of us well.

title: If you have never visited then this is worth a go.
text: Again we returned here for the second time and it was extremely good. The restaurant do a very good buffet and the service is excellent. There is a good shop and bar area but not many guests seem to use this, we found it very interesting and relaxing.

title: An experience worth doing.
text: It is a very busy area and you need to get a guide who knows what he is doing and can get you a good seat. Depending on what time of year you go is what you might see. We saw a mother elephant with her calf swim the river and go ashore...wow.

title: Second Visit.
text: When you return to a Hotel for the second time you do so with anticipation that it will be as good as the first visit............well our second visit was excellent and far exceeded what we remembered from the first time round. The staff are the best, so polite and attentive. The restaurant is excellent try the a la carte specials for a treat they are great. Relaxing in the lounge bar is cool, god service good atmosphere. The grounds are well set out, they have two small pools which are good for a quick dip and my only criticism is there could be more loungers and umbrellas around the place, but saying that I am just being picky. We will certainly visit again.

title: A delight to stay there.
text: We were unfortunately booked into another Hotel which did not match our expectations, however we knew that there was a Sheraton Hotel nearby having stayed there a few years ago so we went along and one of the lobby staff approached us and we told her of our situation and that we needed a room for two nights. The service was excellent and we were really looked after very well. The restaurant is exceptionally good and if you like fish food..........wow. the lounge bar is great the service there is very good. The room we were given was very comfortable and really nice and exceptionally well maintained. When we go back, which we will then it will be the Sheraton for us.

title: A must to see
text: If you go to Hong Kong go here, its a must. Try the Big Bus Company as it goes near here and you can get the cable tram to the top.

title: We left after the first night
text: It maybe a lot of people's idea of an okay Hotel and to be fair there were lots of people staying there, but not for us. The room was small and although very clean was a little tired it needed new furniture flooring and something on the walls to brighten the place up. Sorry but we will not be going there again

title: Our Fouth Visit
text: It is always good to return to somewhere you like and this is one Hotel we like. The service is very good the rooms are well appointed and very comfortable. you get a feeling of quality and comfort throughout the Hotel, it gets our top vote every time

title: A good place to stay
text: We spent a long weekend here and we were really pleased with our choice, the location was very good to visit the palace and to get about to other parts of this lovely city. The hotel was very good and the staff were very good and helpful. The restaurant was exceptionaly god and value for money. My only critisism is that there is no lounge or seperate bar where you can goand relax with a drink, but that would not stop us staying there again.

title: Seeing how these people live.
text: We are always amazed to get the oportunity to meet local people and the tribal community is excellant. the ones we met who spoke a little English were very good we learned alot about their culture and traditions. Sad though tat most have mobile phones and are moving towards the modernworld.

title: First Visit to Prague
text: This Hotel was recommended through our travel agent and it turned out to be a gem. We had a lovely weekend here,the rooms were superb and the breakfast buffet was all you could want. Definetiy we would go back sometime in the futre.

title: Escorted Tour
text: Our son bought for our anniversary present a trip around Borough Market which was through Cecilia Brookes a really good person to show you around. Cecilia runs a business of showing people a gastronomis tour, and she does this really well. The whole experience of the market is great, the variety of foods and drink available is excellant. A great day out and we have already organised our next visit.
